definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: ZBDHD can be used as a basic prescription to treat male infertility suffered from UU infection.
sentences.chinese: 知柏地黄丸可作为治疗UU感染性不育症的基本方。

sentences.english: Its unique method of treatment of the male infertility is a very significant.
sentences.chinese: 其独特的治疗方法对久治不愈的男性不育症极为显著。

sentences.english: Infertility can totally derail the vision you shared for your future.
sentences.chinese: 男性不育症可能会完全改变你未来的世界观。

sentences.english: This article discusses the practical value in the diagnosis of sterility through hysteroscope .
sentences.chinese: 探讨宫腔镜在不孕不育症诊治中的应用价值。

sentences.english: Fortunately, infertility testing and treatment are ubiquitous today.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，不育症的诊断和治疗是相当普遍的。

sentences.english: This article sum up the clinical experience of Qin Man treating infertility due to male's dysspermia.
sentences.chinese: 总结了秦满教授治疗男性不育症的经验。

sentences.english: At this time, bottom of my heart, taking into account the likely autoimmune infertility.
sentences.chinese: 这时，我心中有底，考虑到可能是免疫性不育症。

sentences.english: Objective To look into the relation between genital Chlamydia trachomatis infection and infertility.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨生殖道沙眼衣原体感染与不育症的关系。

sentences.english: The study can also bring the new methods of screening and curing infertility.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究还可能带来检测和治疗不育症的新方法。

definition: to be infertile/to have no offspring
impotence/also written 陽痿|阳痿[yang2 wei3]

pinyin: bo2 qi3 gong1 neng2 zhang4 ai4

definition: vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis
